attributes.action: Scrap These Insulting Plans to Send Nurses on 'Smiling' Courses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a waste of taxpayers money and an insult to overworked and underpaid nurses. Nurses are professionals and we don't need to taught how to smile. Maybe if we were paid fairly in the first place we would have something to smile about. So stop trying to devalue our profession we are underappreciated enough as it is.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
